title: Introductory Differential Equations 4th Ed c2014 Abell txtbk
description:
Introductory Differential Equations, 4th Edition (c2014), textbook by Martha L. Abell & James P. Braselton.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://textbooks.elsevier.com/web/product_details.aspx?isbn=9780124172197" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://textbooks.elsevier.com/web/product_details.aspx?isbn=9780124172197</a>

READERSHIP: Undergraduates in math, biology, chemistry, economics, environmental sciences, physics, computer science and engineering.

BRIEF CONTENTS:
---------------
1. Introduction to Differential Equations
2. First-Order Equations
3. Applications of First-Order Differential Equations
4. Higher Order Equations
5. Applications of Higher-Order Differential Equations
6. Systems of Differential Equations
7. Applications of Systems of Ordinary Differential Equations
8. Introduction to the Laplace Transform

The website above lists 2 more chapters,
 9. Eigenvalue Problems and Fourier Series
 10. Partial Differential Equations
but these will only be found in the parent text Introductory Differential Equations with Boundary-Value Problems not yet released in its 4th edition.

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF
